name: Renovation Frenzy
description:
Renovation game done for the Pestka GameJam! Solo developed game about taking stuff in and out. Be careful with the stuff  u are not supposed to move! It has a only tutorial and Level1 but what can one man do. Jam partially during the week isn't ideal but could be done after work. Enjoy!

FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED!

Credits: 

This project contains music created by David McKee (ViRiX) soundcloud.com/virix

Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo

http://www.matthewpablo.com

Featuring Music by gilzoide @ OpenGameArt

GAME ART, ICONS, TEXTURES, SFX by one and only - Kenney @ Kenney.nl
